name: Xtreme Bottle Shooter Pro
description:
A new extreme bottle shooter trend in the era of bottle shoot games let’s have a fun to break the bottles with your good shooting expertise. There are multiple environment in Xtreme Bottle Shooter Pro

Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics.
- Smooth and clear user controlling to shoot.
- Shooting games with gun and sniper rifle
- There is no limits to play game with turn and time.
- Aim to the target - bottle
- Target can move in different directions in some levels.
- Addictive game play!
